TopicTitle: How do I insert a photo without uploading it to somewhere else?

Articles.Content: I have a rocket that I want to show and ask about, but I can't get the attachment onto here. How do I upload the photo without using other sites?

Short answer, you don't.

The forum software won't allow it.

Upload your picture to injure or IM GB B or any other file setting service and just post the link.

6 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Short answer, you don't.

Oh, well then i'll use imgur I guess.
Also, this question should belong in the 'KSP Network' subforum, as it's about the site. The Gameplay Questions subforum is about questions for the game (such as 'How do I get to the Mun?')

13 hours ago, The_Cat_In_Space said:

Also, this question should belong in the 'KSP Network' subforum, as it's about the site. The Gameplay Questions subforum is about questions for the game (such as 'How do I get to the Mun?')

Sorry about that. Can it be moved? Or removed?

Edited March 7, 2018 by Jollyranger
Added "Or removed?"

To give the longer answer. There is a way, sort of that doesnt require imgur or something like that.

Its only possible while using steam and starting the game with steam and only if you want screenshots of the game. Find the keybinding of steam screenshots. The sceens will appear in your libary of the game in steam and generate a link of the image.

3 hours ago, Jollyranger said:

Sorry about that. Can it be moved? Or removed?

Sure thing, just needs a little TLC from a moderator such as yours truly.  Done. 

(For future reference, any time there's something in the forum-- yours, or someone else's-- that you think needs a moderator's attention, just report the post by clicking the little "report" button, and add a note.  That will ping the moderator team and we'll have a look as soon as we can.)
